name: mockaccino
description: Mock generator for testing C code using C++ gmock classes.

mockaccino.treatLonelyPreprocIfAsActive.description: Treat lonely #if - #endif preprocessor directives as always active (useful for mocking conditionally compiled functions).

mockaccino.additionalPreprocessorDirecti.default:
#define FUNC(rettype, memclass) rettype
#define FUNC_P2CONST(rettype, ptrclass, memclass) const rettype*
#define FUNC_P2VAR(rettype, ptrclass, memclass) rettype*
#define P2VAR(ptrtype, memclass, ptrclass) ptrtype*
#define P2CONST(ptrtype, memclass, ptrclass) const ptrtype* 
#define CONSTP2VAR(ptrtype, memclass, ptrclass) ptrtype *const
#define CONSTP2CONST(ptrtype, memclass, ptrclass) const ptrtype *const
#define P2FUNC(rettype, ptrclass, fctname) rettype (* fctname)
#define CONSTP2FUNC(rettype, ptrclass, fctname) rettype (*const fctname)
#define CONST(type, memclass) const type
#define VAR(vartype, memclass) vartype
#define STD_ON 1
#define STD_OFF 0
#define EM_FILENUM(mod_id, fidx) ;
mockaccino.additionalPreprocessorDirecti.description: Additional preprocessor directives (if/elif/else, define) that will be prepended to each parsed file.

mockaccino.copyright.default:
Copyright (c) $YEAR [INPUT FILE OWNER]. All rights reserved.

WARNING:
PLEASE REPLACE COPYRIGHT STATEMENT IN MOCKACCINO SETTINGS!
mockaccino.copyright.description: Copyright text that will be included in each file.

mockaccino.outputPath.description: Path where mocks should be generated. If empty generate in the same location as input.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
